notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

notes.title: Ethical approval
notes.p: The study consisted of an outbreak investigation in which the municipality and the hospital district have the responsibility to take action against infectious diseases and the right to establish registers on a case-by-case basis, as defined in the Article 23ยง of the Finnish Infectious Diseases Act, thus not requiring a separate ethical approval.
